name: NOMAD: blackbox optimization software

screenshots.caption: NOMAD console on single objective example

short_description: NOMAD is a C++ code that implements the MADS algorithm (Mesh Adaptive Direct Search) for difficult blackbox optimization problems. Such problems occur when the functions to optimize are costly computer simulations with no derivatives.
